summary: This document appears to be a background check or intelligence report on Ryan J. Dionne, linking him to Jeffrey Epstein's network. It compiles his criminal history, personal connections, and open-source references that place him on Epstein's flight manifests and in his 'Black Book' as a former chef.

persons.name: Ryan J Dionne
persons.role: Subject of background check, listed in Epstein's records
persons.context: The primary subject of the document. His criminal history is detailed, and he is linked to Jeffrey Epstein via flight manifests and Epstein's 'Black Book', where he is listed as a former chef.

persons.name: Jessica Dionne
persons.context: Identified as Ryan Dionne's wife via her Twitter handle 'taigigueredionne'. Also referenced by her professional name Jessica Giguere-Dionne.

persons.name: Jessica Giguere-Dionne
persons.role: Finance professional, wife of Ryan Dionne
persons.context: Identified as the same person as Jessica Dionne. Her professional title is listed as AVP, Finance Director at Benefit Strategies, a Voya Financial company. Appears on LinkedIn, Twitter, and Facebook.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced as the central figure to whom Ryan Dionne is connected. Dionne is listed in Epstein's flight logs and 'Black Book', and a court document names him among 70 people who 'knew of sex trafficking and underage victims.'

connections.description: Ryan Dionne is listed in Epstein's 'Black Book' as a former chef, indicating a past employment relationship. He is also listed on Epstein's flight manifests.
Jessica is identified as Ryan Dionne's wife in the document's open-source search results.
Jessica Dionne is identified as Ryan Dionne's wife via her Twitter handle. This appears to be the same person as Jessica Giguere-Dionne.

events.title: Ryan Dionne Arrest - 1998
events.description: Ryan Dionne was arrested for Unsworn Falsification and Resisting detention by the NH0090400 Police Department.

events.title: Ryan Dionne Arrest - June 2019
events.description: Ryan Dionne was arrested for Resist Arrest/Detention (Misd) and Criminal Trespass (Misd) by the NH0090800 Police Department.

events.title: Ryan Dionne Arrest - Stalking
events.description: Ryan Dionne was arrested for Stalking and Criminal Contempt by the NH0092000 Police Department.

keyFacts: Ryan J. Dionne has a criminal history including arrests in 1998, June 2019, and June 2019 for charges ranging from falsification to stalking.
Ryan Dionne is listed in Jeffrey Epstein's 'Black Book' and is identified in associated articles as a former chef for Epstein.
Ryan Dionne is listed on flight manifests associated with Jeffrey Epstein.
A court document related to Jeffrey Epstein names Ryan Dionne among 70 people who 'knew of sex trafficking and underage victims.'
Ryan Dionne's wife is identified as Jessica Giguere-Dionne, a finance professional at a Voya Financial company.
